K

KMeans - Class in it.unipi.hadoop
A class that implements the K-means algorithm using Hadoop MapReduce.
KMeans() - Constructor for class it.unipi.hadoop.KMeans
 
KMeansCombiner - Class in it.unipi.hadoop
The KMeansCombiner class extends the Reducer class and is used to combine the intermediate results of the KMeans clustering algorithm.
KMeansCombiner() - Constructor for class it.unipi.hadoop.KMeansCombiner
 
KMeansIterations(Configuration, Path, Path, int) - Static method in class it.unipi.hadoop.KMeans
Performs iterations of the K-means algorithm using the specified configuration, input path, number of reducers, and output path.
KMeansMapper - Class in it.unipi.hadoop
Mapper class for the K-Means algorithm.
